code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function WeatherWidget(_ref){let{setWeather}=_ref;const[weather,setLocalWeather]=useState("Loading...");useEffect(()=>{const opts=["Sunny","Cloudy","Rainy"];const idx=(new Date().getDate()+new Date().getMonth())%opts.length;const w=opts[idx];setLocalWeather(w);if(setWeather)setWeather(w);},[setWeather]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:12,padding:10,borderRadius:8,background:"#eff6ff",border:"1px solid #e0f2fe"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontSize:13,color:"#0f172a",fontWeight:600},children:"\uD83C\uDF24 Weather (Majayjay)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:6,color:"#475569"},children:weather})]});}
